name: Red Triangles
description:
This is a brief tech demo using home brew kinematics. The player takes control of a simple spaceship in the starless void and must use the time they have to survive for as long as possible.

In this game, others ships will move toward you, and your goal is to outmaneuver them and avoid getting hit. Your ship glides with no friction in space, but so do the enemies, so move wisely to survive long.

WASD to move

R to restart
